ca.utoronto.utm.paint

类 Polyline

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Shape
        • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Polyline

  • public class Polyline
extends Shape
    a subclass from Shape, creates a polyline object which allows user to click on the canvas and the polyline will be automatically formed.
    作者:
    Mengning Yang Modified by Junwen Shen

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Polyline(Point origin, javafx.scene.paint.Color outlineColor, int thickness)
      Constructor of the Polyline object, which has an arrayList that stores all the points that the user clicks.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addPoint(Point p)
      Add new points to the arrayList of points collection of the polyline object.
      void calcPoints(Point p)
      calculation before a new point is added.
      void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
      override method from Shape, which the polyline knows how to draw it self,given a double array of points, lines will be automatically connected between those points.
      boolean getDifference(Point point) 

      • 从类继承的方法 ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Shape

        getColor, getFilled, getFinished, getOrigin, getOutlineColor, getOutlined, getStroke, getThickness, setColor, setFilled, setOrigin, setOutlined, setStroke, setThickness

      • 从类继承的方法 java.util.Observable

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Polyline

        public Polyline(Point origin,
                javafx.scene.paint.Color outlineColor,
                int thickness)
        Constructor of the Polyline object, which has an arrayList that stores all the points that the user clicks.
        参数:
        origin - initial point of the polyline
        outlineColor - color of the polyline
        thickness - thickness of the polyline

    • 方法详细资料

      • draw

        public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
        override method from Shape, which the polyline knows how to draw it self,given a double array of points, lines will be automatically connected between those points. Note: When the last point(the polygon is finished) is close to the initial point of the polyline, it will form a Polygon.
        指定者:
        draw 在类中 Shape

      • calcPoints

        public void calcPoints(Point p)
        calculation before a new point is added.
        指定者:
        calcPoints 在类中 Shape

      • addPoint

        public void addPoint(Point p)
        Add new points to the arrayList of points collection of the polyline object.
        覆盖:
        addPoint 在类中 Shape

      • getDifference

        public boolean getDifference(Point point)
        参数:
        point - last point of the polyline obeject
        返回:
        return true if the different of the given point and the last point of the polyline is less than 5.
